posts.post_content: I want to pick up a couple of T207s. Big deal, right? But I don't want Recruit backs. I'm looking for a Napoleon or anonymous Tex Covington and a blank back Paddy Livingston. I was the underbidder on a blank Livingston on eBay a year or two ago. I trust the winning bidder would now rather have a real card instead of that handcut blank back garbage, and I would be happy to help take it off his hands.

It is highly unlikely that a T207 Covington exists with an Anonymous back.  None are known.  A blank back and Napoleon are possible, though.  BTW Livingston is not known with an Anonymous back either.
Thank you, Ron. I can cross that off my wantlist.
